org.yawlfoundation.yawl.util

Class YPluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.yawlfoundation.yawl.util.YPluginLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class YPluginLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    Loads classes from specified paths that implement or extend a particular class
    Author:
    Michael Adams
    Created/Last Date:
    16/04/14

    • Constructor Detail

      • YPluginLoader

        public YPluginLoader(java.lang.String searchPath)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        searchPath - the path(s) to search for jar and class files. Multiple paths can be specified, separated by semi-colons (;). Any sub-directories are also searched

      • getInstance

        public <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> mask,
                         java.lang.String instanceName)
        Loads a class that implements or subclasses a specified class and matches a specific name
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        mask - the interface or super class to use as the basis of the load
        instanceName - the name of the class to load an instance of
        Returns:
        the loaded instance, or null if a matching class isn't found
